abstract: No one was injured, but delays on the uptown 4, 5 and 6 lines continued through the morning.
snippet: No one was injured, but delays on the uptown 4, 5 and 6 lines continued through the morning.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 11:16 | Two cars of an uptown-bound No. 6 train derailed south of Canal Street before dawn Monday morning, injuring no one but snarling commutes on the Lexington Avenue line.

headline.main: Derailment of 6 Train Delays Subway Commute
